name: Stage Fright (itch) (Sage Made, Vivian Winters, RikuPhantom, Moishe Grosh, HowDoesOneMath, Catalinae)
name_original: Stage Fright (itch) (Sage Made, Vivian Winters, RikuPhantom, Moishe Grosh, HowDoesOneMath, Catalinae)
description:
Play Online

Its your turn to go up on stage, but your running out of time. Try to escape the theater before time runs out, or else be brought back to the beginning. "Once more, with feeling!"

Created for ToJam 2021

Controls: Gamepad:

Left Stick > Run Left/Right (A) > Jump (X) > Attack (B) > Roll Keyboard/Mouse A/D > Run Left/Right Space > Jump Left Click > Attack Left Shift > Roll
